Package com.aevi.helpers.services

This package contains the base classes for the various Aevi services and holds general exceptions that can be thrown in case of faults.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AeviService
    The base interface used for defining an AeviService
    AeviServiceConnectionCallback<T extends AeviService>
    Declaration for objects that want to receive SharedPreferencesServiceProvider connection notifications.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AeviServiceConnection<T extends AeviService>
    Base class for a service connection to an AeviService
    AeviServiceProvider<T extends AeviService>
    Base class for service providers of AeviService.
    RemoteServiceError
    RemoteServiceError is used to be able to transfer exceptions via an AIDL interface.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    AeviServiceConnectionException
    Exception that should be thrown when there is a problem connecting to an AeviService
    AeviServiceException
    Base class for exceptions that happen while trying to use a AeviService

Package com.aevi.helpers.services Description

This package contains the base classes for the various Aevi services and holds general exceptions that can be thrown in case of faults. All Aevi services follow the same initialization patterns; first create an instance of the associated Service Provider and call the AeviServiceProvider.connect(AeviServiceConnectionCallback) method. This returns the initialized Aevi services via the supplied callback. The following services are available; CrashLogService, PrintService, TransactionLogService and SharedPreferencesService.
